Value.label: Device status upon receipt of a Basic Set

Value.label: ON_LEVEL Group 2
Value.Help: ON_LEVEL value used for devices belonging to Group 2 (1 Click association group). Set value from 0 to 255 (Default: 255)

Value.label: OFF_LEVEL Group 2
Value.Help: OFF_LEVEL value used for devices belonging to Group 2 (1 Click association group). Set value from 0 to 255 (Default: 0)

Value.label: ON_LEVEL Group 3
Value.Help: ON_LEVEL value used for devices belonging to Group 3 (2 Click association group). Set value from 0 to 255 (Default: 255)

Value.label: OFF_LEVEL Group 3
Value.Help: OFF_LEVEL value used for devices belonging to Group 3 (2 Click association group). Set value from 0 to 255 (Default: 0)

Value.label: ON_LEVEL Group 4
Value.Help: ON_LEVEL value used for devices belonging to Group 4 (3 Click association group). Set value from 0 to 255 (Default: 255)

Value.label: OFF_LEVEL Group 4
Value.Help: OFF_LEVEL value used for devices belonging to Group 4 (3 Click association group). Set value from 0 to 255 (Default: 0)

Value.label: ON_LEVEL Group 5
Value.Help: ON_LEVEL value used for devices belonging to Group 5 (Hold association group). Set value from 0 to 255 (Default: 255)

Value.label: OFF_LEVEL Group 5
Value.Help: OFF_LEVEL value used for devices belonging to Group 5 (Hold association group). Set value from 0 to 255 (Default: 0)

Value.Help: Duration of flashing phase. Set value from 0 to 255 (Default: 10)

Value.Help: Learn Mode

Group.label: devices that will be notified of changes in its status
devices that will be controlled by a single click on the external switch
devices that will be controlled by a double click on the external switch
devices that will be controlled by a triple click on the external switch
devices that will be controlled by hold on the external switch
